paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene with associated penetrance data.

patients.demographics: Elderly and young acute leukemia patients

functional_data.summary: The specific functional impact of the BRCA2 variants was not detailed in the paper.

variants.evidence_level: strong evidence for pathogenicity based on clinical significance
variants.additional_notes: The BRCA2 variants were noted as common in elderly ALL patients.
key_quotes: The most common pathogenic gene variants in ALL patients are BRCA2 (Exon11 c.6468_6469delTC (11%) and Exon23 c.907delA (11%)).
